response.overview: One night in the Maracay of the 60s, in the room of Mother María de San José, a small light enters through the window that becomes a girl in the reflection of a mirror, this girl named Laurita is the cocoon where the miracle germinated made a woman who was Mother Mary of Saint Joseph.  Thus begins the story that leads us through the past of that girl, who from a very early age discovered her vocation of dedication to the work of God. We can see how a father, who did not understand beyond his love for his favorite daughter, that she wanted so much to unite with God and harshly rebukes her to the pain and anguish of both.
response.title: El amor de los amores
